(): React.Node => (
  <Stack>
    <Stack>
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Start
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip
        preferredAlign="start"
        content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}
      >
        <Button size="large" disabled>
          Book
        </Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
    <Stack>
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        Center
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip
        preferredAlign="center"
        content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}
      >
        <Button size="large" disabled>
          Book
        </Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
    <Stack>
      <Heading type="title3" as="h4">
        End
      </Heading>
      <Tooltip
        preferredAlign="end"
        content={<Text>Select a flight before continuing.</Text>}
      >
        <Button size="large" disabled>
          Book
        </Button>
      </Tooltip>
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Alignment
info.description: If you set a preferred alignment, the tooltip will be placed there if there's room. Otherwise, preference is given in the order of: center, start, end.
